description: Improper access control vulnerability in WSR-1166DHP3 firmware Ver.1.16 and prior and WSR-1166DHP4 firmware Ver.1.02 and prior allows an attacker to obtain configuration information via unspecified vectors.

enisaIdProduct.product_version: WSR-1166DHP3 firmware Ver.1.16 and prior and WSR-1166DHP4 firmware Ver.1.02 and prior
